name: Connect4 (ZX Spectrum)
description:
Connect4

A simple implementation of the well-known Connect Four (a.k.a. Four in a Row, Forza Quattro, Gravitrips) board game for the ZX Spectrum, coded in C language and built with z88dk.

It is my entry to the FORZA 4 Challenge by RetroProgramming Italia - RP Italia.

Emulation powered by JSSpeccy.
Sinclair and ZX Spectrum are © Amstrad / Sky In-Home Service Ltd.
